ModMetaData.name: High Tech Laboratory Facilities Standalone
ModMetaData.author: Pravus
ModMetaData.description:
基于 Mlie 的 High Tech Laboratory Facilities (Continued)，将新材质提取成独立建筑（比如说高科技研究台），这样就能同时使用原版跟模组里的材质了。 强烈推荐搭配模组：Vanilla Textures Expanded
A fork for Mlie's High Tech Laboratory Facilities (Continued), which take use of mod textures as standalone buildings (like HiTechResearchBench) so we can use both vanilla and modded ones. I really like textures for both of them! Strongly suggest companion: Vanilla Textures Expanded
